items.sentence: Mary wasn't in the room, but I could still smell her perfume.
Tom's overall message was good, but the delivery was way off.
I've arranged my schedule so we can spend more time together.
You'll never be able to sell that unless you lower the price.
It's good that you came. What would we have done without you?
Tom's mother lives in Boston and his father lives in Chicago.
Those tires cost twice as much as the ones I ended up buying.
These vases will probably sell for about thirty dollars each.
Italo Calvino returned to Italy when he was still just a boy.
I wonder whether or not Tom wants to go to Australia with us.
